name: Mouse or Man?
description:
Mouse Or Man?

Made in ~1 month for the GitHub Game Off 2022 game jam.

The small rural town of Cheeseshire is well known for its production of delightful cheese....and as a Weremouse, you've been drawn there to feed! The only problem is that Magnus, the man whose family bankrolls cheese production, has disappeared. Help the residents of Cheeseshire figure out what happened to Magnus so that you can satiate your desire to feast on the delicious cheese!

This is a retro-ish game with grid-based movement and point-and-click story-centric puzzles. It should take less than 20 minutes to finish.

The code (as well as some design stuff and a postmortem) is available on Github: https://github.com/bitwisebones/GameOff2022
